transforms.code:
tagPath = value + '/machineInput/' + 'Parameters'
	tags = system.tag.browse(tagPath)
	
	tagDict = {}
	
	for tag in tags.getResults():
		tagFullPath = str(tag['fullPath'])
		tagValue = system.tag.read(tagFullPath).value
		tagDict[tag['name']] = tagValue
		
	return tagDict

self.custom.FinalParams = value
	self.custom.FinalParams['Parameters'] = self.custom.SelectedParameters
	
	return self.custom.FinalParams

config.script:
try:
		params = self.view.custom.FinalParams
#		for key, value in params.items():
#			if not value: raise ValueError('The value for key {} is empty'.format(key))
		params = {
			'EqID': self.view.params.EqData.EqID,
			'EqType': self.view.params.EqData.EqType,
			'EqEnabled': self.view.params.EqData.EqEnabled,
			'EqName': self.view.params.EqData.EqName,
			'EqPath': self.view.params.EqData.EqPath,
			'SelectedUDT': 'machineInput',
			'Parameters': {
				'fault': self.view.custom.SelectedParameters.fault,
				'reject': self.view.custom.SelectedParameters.reject,
				'outfeed': self.view.custom.SelectedParameters.outfeed,
				'infeed': self.view.custom.SelectedParameters.infeed,
				'server': self.view.custom.SelectedParameters.server,
				'device': self.view.custom.SelectedParameters.device
			}
		}
				
		res = mes.config.equipment.assetEdit(params)
		if res is not True: raise ValueError('Writing to tags failed. ' + str(res))
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshTree')
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshUDTTree')
		system.perspective.sendMessage('refreshStatesTable')
		system.perspective.closePopup(self.view.params.ModalName)
	except Exception as e:
	    gpa.frontEnd.localUI.throwError(e)
	else:
		gpa.frontEnd.localUI.throwSuccess('Configuration saved')
